description:
An aide-de-camp of the Chinese Federation. He was stationed in Area 11 as an attendant to Gao Hai, one of the High Eunuchs. He has the intelligence that equals Lelouch, and combat skills that match Suzaku.
However, the one thing he lacks is time; Xingke is cursed with a chronic illness, frequently coughing up blood.
name: Li XingKe
